Articles.Content: I am trying to create a mushroom cloud with a fireball, I have a couple of FX that works together to form an explosion, but when i attempt to export it, only 1 is exported, and no texture files are created. Can anyone tell me is this absent of texture normal, and is there a way to combine multiple fx into 1?

Not sure if this relates to your situation in particular..but i found this emissive tutorials interesting enough. Perhaps it could be of use to you.

 

https://youtu.be/x5V056naRQI
